content:
ISqlManagementClient ISqlManagementClient Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql.dll

The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases and servers.

Edit

In this Article

public interface ISqlManagementClient : IDisposablePublic Interface ISqlManagementClient
    Inherits IDisposable

Properties

ApiVersion ApiVersion

Edit

Gets the API version.

string ApiVersion { get; }ReadOnly Property ApiVersion As String
Value
String String

AuditingPolicy AuditingPolicy

Edit

Represents all the operations to manage Azure SQL Database and Database Server Audit policy. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve and Update audit policy.

IAuditingPolicyOperations AuditingPolicy { get; }ReadOnly Property AuditingPolicy As IAuditingPolicyOperations
Value
IAuditingPolicyOperations IAuditingPolicyOperations

BaseUri BaseUri

Edit

Gets the URI used as the base for all cloud service requests.

Uri BaseUri { get; }ReadOnly Property BaseUri As Uri
Value
Uri Uri

BlobAuditing BlobAuditing

Edit

Represents all the operations to manage Azure SQL Database and Server blob auditing. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve and Update blob auditing settings.

IBlobAuditingOperations BlobAuditing { get; }ReadOnly Property BlobAuditing As IBlobAuditingOperations
Value
IBlobAuditingOperations IBlobAuditingOperations

Capabilities Capabilities

Edit

Represents all the operations for determining the set of capabilites available in a specified region.

ICapabilitiesOperations Capabilities { get; }ReadOnly Property Capabilities As ICapabilitiesOperations
Value
ICapabilitiesOperations ICapabilitiesOperations

CommunicationLinks CommunicationLinks

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Server communication links. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete.

IServerCommunicationLinkOperations CommunicationLinks { get; }ReadOnly Property CommunicationLinks As IServerCommunicationLinkOperations
Value
IServerCommunicationLinkOperations IServerCommunicationLinkOperations

Credentials Credentials

Edit

Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

SubscriptionCloudCredentials Credentials { get; }ReadOnly Property Credentials As SubscriptionCloudCredentials
Value
SubscriptionCloudCredentials SubscriptionCloudCredentials

DatabaseActivation DatabaseActivation

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating pertaining to activation on Azure SQL Data Warehouse databases. Contains operations to: Pause and Resume databases

IDatabaseActivationOperations DatabaseActivation { get; }ReadOnly Property DatabaseActivation As IDatabaseActivationOperations
Value
IDatabaseActivationOperations IDatabaseActivationOperations

DatabaseAdvisors DatabaseAdvisors

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing Advisors for Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to retrieve Advisors and update auto execute status of an Advisor.

IDatabaseAdvisorOperations DatabaseAdvisors { get; }ReadOnly Property DatabaseAdvisors As IDatabaseAdvisorOperations
Value
IDatabaseAdvisorOperations IDatabaseAdvisorOperations

DatabaseBackup DatabaseBackup

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database database backups.

IDatabaseBackupOperations DatabaseBackup { get; }ReadOnly Property DatabaseBackup As IDatabaseBackupOperations
Value
IDatabaseBackupOperations IDatabaseBackupOperations

DatabaseRecommendedActions DatabaseRecommendedActions

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing recommended actions on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to retrieve recommended action and update its state.

IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations DatabaseRecommendedActions { get; }ReadOnly Property DatabaseRecommendedActions As IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations
Value
IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations

DatabaseReplicationLinks DatabaseReplicationLinks

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Replication Links. Contains operations to: Delete and Retrieve replication links.

IReplicationLinkOperations DatabaseReplicationLinks { get; }ReadOnly Property DatabaseReplicationLinks As IReplicationLinkOperations
Value
IReplicationLinkOperations IReplicationLinkOperations

Databases Databases

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete databases, and also includes the ability to get the event logs for a database.

IDatabaseOperations Databases { get; }ReadOnly Property Databases As IDatabaseOperations
Value
IDatabaseOperations IDatabaseOperations

DataMasking DataMasking

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database data masking. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete data masking rules, as well as Create, Retreive and Update data masking policy.

IDataMaskingOperations DataMasking { get; }ReadOnly Property DataMasking As IDataMaskingOperations
Value
IDataMaskingOperations IDataMaskingOperations

ElasticPoolAdvisors ElasticPoolAdvisors

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing Advisors for Azure SQL Elastic Database Pool. Contains operations to retrieve Advisors and update auto execute status of an Advisor.

IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations ElasticPoolAdvisors { get; }ReadOnly Property ElasticPoolAdvisors As IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations
Value
IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations

ElasticPoolRecommendedActions ElasticPoolRecommendedActions

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing recommended actions on Azure SQL Elastic Database Pools. Contains operations to retrieve recommended action and update its state.

IElasticPoolRecommendedActionOperations ElasticPoolRecommendedActions { get; }ReadOnly Property ElasticPoolRecommendedActions As IElasticPoolRecommendedActionOperations
Value
IElasticPoolRecommendedActionOperations IElasticPoolRecommendedActionOperations

ElasticPools ElasticPools

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Elastic Pools. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete.

IElasticPoolOperations ElasticPools { get; }ReadOnly Property ElasticPools As IElasticPoolOperations
Value
IElasticPoolOperations IElasticPoolOperations

FirewallRules FirewallRules

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Server Firewall Rules. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete firewall rules.

IFirewallRuleOperations FirewallRules { get; }ReadOnly Property FirewallRules As IFirewallRuleOperations
Value
IFirewallRuleOperations IFirewallRuleOperations

ImportExport ImportExport

Edit

Represents all the operations for import/export on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to: Import, Export, Get Import/Export status for a database.

IImportExportOperations ImportExport { get; }ReadOnly Property ImportExport As IImportExportOperations
Value
IImportExportOperations IImportExportOperations

JobAccounts JobAccounts

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Job Accounts. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete Job Accounts

IJobAccountOperations JobAccounts { get; }ReadOnly Property JobAccounts As IJobAccountOperations
Value
IJobAccountOperations IJobAccountOperations

LongRunningOperationInitialTimeout LongRunningOperationInitialTimeout

Edit

Gets or sets the initial timeout for Long Running Operations.

int LongRunningOperationInitialTimeout { get; set; }Property LongRunningOperationInitialTimeout As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

LongRunningOperationRetryTimeout LongRunningOperationRetryTimeout

Edit

Gets or sets the retry timeout for Long Running Operations.

int LongRunningOperationRetryTimeout { get; set; }Property LongRunningOperationRetryTimeout As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

RecommendedElasticPools RecommendedElasticPools

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Recommended Elastic Pools. Contains operations to: Retrieve.

IRecommendedElasticPoolOperations RecommendedElasticPools { get; }ReadOnly Property RecommendedElasticPools As IRecommendedElasticPoolOperations
Value
IRecommendedElasticPoolOperations IRecommendedElasticPoolOperations

RecommendedIndexes RecommendedIndexes

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing recommended indexes on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to retrieve recommended index and update state.

IRecommendedIndexOperations RecommendedIndexes { get; }ReadOnly Property RecommendedIndexes As IRecommendedIndexOperations
Value
IRecommendedIndexOperations IRecommendedIndexOperations

SecureConnection SecureConnection

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing Azure SQL Database secure connection. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve and Update secure connection policy .

ISecureConnectionPolicyOperations SecureConnection { get; }ReadOnly Property SecureConnection As ISecureConnectionPolicyOperations
Value
ISecureConnectionPolicyOperations ISecureConnectionPolicyOperations

SecurityAlertPolicy SecurityAlertPolicy

Edit

Represents all the operations to manage Azure SQL Database and Database Server Security Alert policy. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve and Update policy.

ISecurityAlertPolicyOperations SecurityAlertPolicy { get; }ReadOnly Property SecurityAlertPolicy As ISecurityAlertPolicyOperations
Value
ISecurityAlertPolicyOperations ISecurityAlertPolicyOperations

ServerAdministrators ServerAdministrators

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrators. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete Azure SQL Server Active Directory Administrators.

IServerAdministratorOperations ServerAdministrators { get; }ReadOnly Property ServerAdministrators As IServerAdministratorOperations
Value
IServerAdministratorOperations IServerAdministratorOperations

ServerAdvisors ServerAdvisors

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing Advisors for Azure SQL Server. Contains operations to retrieve Advisors and update auto execute status of an Advisor.

IServerAdvisorOperations ServerAdvisors { get; }ReadOnly Property ServerAdvisors As IServerAdvisorOperations
Value
IServerAdvisorOperations IServerAdvisorOperations

ServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurations ServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurations

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Server disaster recovery configurations. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, Failover, and Delete.

IServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurationOperations ServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurations { get; }ReadOnly Property ServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurations As IServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurationOperations
Value
IServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurationOperations IServerDisasterRecoveryConfigurationOperations

ServerKey ServerKey

Edit

Represents all the operations of Azure SQL Database that interact with Azure Key Vault Server Keys. Contains operations to: Add, Delete, and Retrieve Server Ke.

IServerKeyOperations ServerKey { get; }ReadOnly Property ServerKey As IServerKeyOperations
Value
IServerKeyOperations IServerKeyOperations

ServerRecommendedActions ServerRecommendedActions

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing recommended actions on Azure SQL Server. Contains operations to retrieve recommended action and update its state.

IServerRecommendedActionOperations ServerRecommendedActions { get; }ReadOnly Property ServerRecommendedActions As IServerRecommendedActionOperations
Value
IServerRecommendedActionOperations IServerRecommendedActionOperations

Servers Servers

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Servers. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete servers.

IServerOperations Servers { get; }ReadOnly Property Servers As IServerOperations
Value
IServerOperations IServerOperations

ServerUpgrades ServerUpgrades

Edit

Represents all the operations for Azure SQL Database Server Upgrade

IServerUpgradeOperations ServerUpgrades { get; }ReadOnly Property ServerUpgrades As IServerUpgradeOperations
Value
IServerUpgradeOperations IServerUpgradeOperations

ServiceObjectives ServiceObjectives

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Service Objectives. Contains operations to: Retrieve service objectives.

IServiceObjectiveOperations ServiceObjectives { get; }ReadOnly Property ServiceObjectives As IServiceObjectiveOperations
Value
IServiceObjectiveOperations IServiceObjectiveOperations

ServiceTierAdvisors ServiceTierAdvisors

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on service tier advisors. Contains operations to: Retrieve.

IServiceTierAdvisorOperations ServiceTierAdvisors { get; }ReadOnly Property ServiceTierAdvisors As IServiceTierAdvisorOperations
Value
IServiceTierAdvisorOperations IServiceTierAdvisorOperations

TransparentDataEncryption TransparentDataEncryption

Edit

Represents all the operations of Azure SQL Database Transparent Data Encryption. Contains operations to: Retrieve, and Update Transparent Data Encryption.

ITransparentDataEncryptionOperations TransparentDataEncryption { get; }ReadOnly Property TransparentDataEncryption As ITransparentDataEncryptionOperations
Value
ITransparentDataEncryptionOperations ITransparentDataEncryptionOperations
